title: Citi Honors Nelson Mandela with a $200,000 Citi Foundation Contribution to the Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital
summary: New York - In tribute to the life of Nelson Mandela, the Citi Foundation is contributing $200,000 to the Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital in Johannesburg, which honors Mr. Mandela's life-long commitment to children. The ambitious project, initiated by the Nelson Mandela Children's Fund, aims to build a 200-bed academic and pediatric referral facility that will serve children across Southern Africa.
tag-1: Citi Honors Nelson Mandela with a $200,000 Citi Foundation Contribution to the Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital
tag-2: New York – In tribute to the life of Nelson Mandela, the Citi Foundation is contributing $200,000 to the Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital in Johannesburg, which honors Mr. Mandela's life-long commitment to children. The ambitious project, initiated by the Nelson Mandela Children's Fund, aims to build a 200-bed academic and pediatric referral facility that will serve children across Southern Africa.
tag-3: "Citi joins the entire world in mourning the passing of Nelson Mandela, a tireless champion of equality who humbly served mankind through his advocacy for peace, humanity and reconciliation," said Citi CEO Michael Corbat. "Through his life's work, which was informed by his own personal struggle for justice, Mr. Mandela dismantled institutional barriers to freedom and unlocked the opportunity for his fellow South Africans to fully join the global community of nations. The legacy of his inspirational voice will continue to reach across Africa and the world. The Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital furthers his life's work and we are proud to support it, consistent with his wishes."

tag-6: The Citi Foundation The Citi Foundation is committed to the economic empowerment and financial inclusion of low- to moderate-income individuals and families in the communities where we work so that they can improve their standard of living. Globally, the Citi Foundation targets its strategic giving to priority focus areas: Microfinance, Enterprise Development, College Success, and Financial Capability and Asset Building. In the United States, the Citi Foundation also supports Neighborhood Revitalization programs. The Citi Foundation works with its partners in Microfinance, Enterprise Development, and Neighborhood Revitalization to support environmental programs and innovations.
